Gutta podrica: a treatise of the gout The severall sorts thereof. VVhat diet is good for such as are troubled therewith. And some approved medicines and remedies for the same. Perused by P.H. Dr. in Physick. Holland, Philemon, 1552-1637. Holland, William, 1592-1632.
[6], 49, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, London : 1633.
Sometimes attributed to William Holland. "P.H." is probably Philemon Holland, the editor. Running title reads: A treatise of the gout. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======

[6], 49, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper, London : 1633.
Sometimes attributed to William Holland. "P.H." is probably Philemon Holland, the editor. Running title reads: A treatise of the gout. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
